short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks downloads of executable filetypes (exe, com, bat, cmd, vbs).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blocks download of some executable filetypes like .exe, .msi, .vbs, .com, .bat, .cmd


NEW in 1.0.2: You can configure your own blocklist in options-page.

Please give some feedback.

--
Hint from Justin :)

You can push your configuration to clients by rolling out the file
"chrome-extension_cjahhhdejgeeijmmlinkckdmlheefcke_0.localstorage" located in "%localappdata%\Google\Chrome\User Data\Default\Local Storage" 
by using a group policy script.
